edits.corrected_text: she did, if it be the source of earnestness),
edits.original_text: she did, if it be the source of earnestness),

edits.corrected_text: and now and then a word of encouragement from him, as they walked on slowly and almost silently under the darkening trees.
edits.notes: Added sentence after 'she did, if it be the source of earnestness),'
edits.original_text: and then a word of en- couragement from him, as they walked on slowly and almost silently under the darkening trees.

edits.corrected_text: “And, now, Minnie Gowan,” at length, said Clennam, smiling; “will you ask me nothing?”
edits.original_text: “And, now, Minnie Gowan,” at length, said Clennam, smiling; “will you ask me nothing?”

edits.corrected_text: “Oh! I have very much to ask of you.”
edits.original_text: “Oh! I have very much to ask of you.”
